content: Transparent, containing either flow content (excluding interactive content) or phrasing content.
omission: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.
parents: Any element that accepts phrasing content, or any element that accepts flow content, but always excluding <a> elements (according to the logical principle of symmetry, if <a> tag, as a parent, can not have interactive content, then the same <a> content can not have <a> tag as its parent).
